title: Utilities for Updating R
text: goal updater ease R update process. package re-install packages available previous version R system library new installation. package uses {renv} install packages, adding installation {renv} cache. Importantly, package re-installs packages copy previous R installation library. R packages minor R releases (e.g. R 4.1 R 4.2) may compatible, ’s important re-install packages copy .

title: Utilities for Updating R
text: Record location current R system library Open current version R (update), type .libPaths() console. current R system library locations print console: save file locations, e.g. copy past locations Notepad TextEdit. may possible skip step find library location calling find_previous_library_location() updated R session, ’s recommended use .libPaths() now ensure accuracy. Install R Download install new version R https://cran.r-project.org/. Install packages Open new version R install {updater} package install.packages("updater"). Run updater::install_pkgs(lib.loc = c("<location(s) saved Step 1>")). mentioned , didn’t record location, may try locate find_previous_library_location().

title: Find Package Library — find_previous_library_location
text: function searches system paths find location previous R version's system library location. recommended use function! Rather, recommend user simply opens previous version R runs .libPaths() find library location(s).

title: Find Package Library — find_previous_library_location
code: find_previous_library_location() #> ✖ Could not determine the last R version installed. #> ✖ Couldn't locate previous R version's package library.

what: Re-install Packages from Previous Installation — install_pkgs
title: Re-install Packages from Previous Installation — install_pkgs
text: Provided location previous R installation's package library, function attempt re-install packages found. Packages installed renv::install() added 'renv' package cache. Packages can installed GitHub, GitLab, BioConductor, repository listed getOption("repos"). typically CRAN secondary repositories may set.

text: lib.loc character vector describing location R library trees search

title: Re-install Packages from Previous Installation — install_pkgs
R Versions — r_version
text: functions return current R version previously installed R version. format returned version matches default folder name R installed.

title: R Versions — r_version
code: r_version() #> [1] "R-4.2.0"  previous_r_version() #> ✖ Could not determine the last R version installed.

what: updater: Utilities for Updating R — updater-package
title: updater: Utilities for Updating R — updater-package
text: updating major minor R versions packages re-installed. utilities package assist getting user --running installing previously installed R packages. package uses 'renv' install; immediately replenishing 'renv' package cache.

title: updater (development version)
text: Added condition previous_r_version() R version returned must begin "R-". Previously, incorrect value returned R version. (#2)
